response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both of us, and I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am extending an offer to purchase it for $1,150,000. I understand that this might be a significant investment, but I am confident that it will provide substantial returns and meet your expectations. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange the details accordingly.", "product_price": 1150000}
